title: Bloomberg Markets: Miroshnik on Crypto-Currency Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Miroshnik on Crypto-Currency Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Stan Miroshnik Chief Executive Officer Element Group Discussing why crypto-currencies are a unique way of thinking about money.
